divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking home with a friend and the bright orange light caught our attention.I was curious at first then quickly realized this was not normal.It moved vary slow laterally then picked up speed moving up and then down then disappeared.It lasted about a minute and a half.The light was larger than any light that would have been on a plane or helicopter,and the wrong colour.We are past Chinese New Year,I don't think it was a lantern. Too big and too high.
Summary: The globe looked close,stopped,changed direction 3 times then disappeared
